data.title: Scientific Reports
data.text:
Our Editors

Scientific Reports is run by a team of experienced editors who are experts in their fields. From our Editorial Board Members and Senior Editorial Board to our in-house Editors, we work together to ensure that your research is expertly handled and that we consider it to be technically sound, scientifically valid, and ultimately suitable for publication.

In-house Editors led by Chief Editor Dr Rafal Marszalek

Senior Editorial Board

Editorial Board Members

Biology

Medicine

Physics

Chemistry

Materials

Earth & Environment

Engineering

Registered Reports

Interview with Rafal Marszalek, Chief Editor of Scientific Reports

In-house Editors

Chief Editor: Rafal Marszalek, PhD; Springer Nature, UK

Rafal's background is analytical and biological chemistry. He did his PhD and postdoctoral research in single-cell proteomics at Imperial College London, UK. He was an editor at Genome Biology before joining Scientific Reports in August 2016.

ORCID 0000-0003-0316-1363

Deputy Editor: Anam Akhtar, PhD; Springer Nature, UK

Anam joined Scientific Reports in October 2023 after working for four years at Communications Biology. She completed her PhD in nanomedicine from Middlesex University and has experience in nanoparticles design and applications. She is based in London office.

ORCID 0000-0002-8820-8468

Deputy Editor: Elizabeth Mann, PhD; Springer Nature, UK

Elizabeth has a background in pharmacology and completed her PhD in neuropharmacology at King's College London, UK. She joined Scientific Reports in January 2019.

ORCID 0000-0003-2616-3193

Deputy Editor: Eve Rooks, PhD; Springer Nature, UK

Eve joined Scientific Reports in 2019, after working as an editor on the Royal Society of Chemistry’s materials chemistry and engineering portfolio for 3 years. Prior to this she completed a PhD in Earth Sciences at the University of Cambridge, UK in igneous petrology and mantle geochemistry. Her interests lie in materials for energy applications and deep earth geochemistry.

ORCID 0000-0001-5083-5936

Deputy Editor: Akila Sridhar, PhD; Springer Nature, UK

Akila joined Scientific Reports in September 2022 after working for four years with BMC Series Journals as a Senior Editor. She has a PhD in Microbiology from University of Aberdeen, UK and worked as an EMBO postdoctoral Fellow at Instituto Gulbenkian de Ciência, Portugal. Over her eleven years in research, she worked on understanding telomere biology and has experience in cell, molecular and developmental biology.

ORCID 0000-0003-1459-5888

Deputy Editor: Madushi Wanaguru, PhD; Springer Nature, UK

Madushi’s background is in biochemistry and molecular biology. She joined Scientific Reports in 2019 after a PhD at the Wellcome Trust Sanger Institute in Cambridge, UK and post-doctoral work at the Francis Crick Institute in London, UK.

ORCID 0000-0002-9656-2

Senior Editor: Silvia Butera, PhD; Springer Nature, UK

Silvia joined Scientific Reports in March 2021, after being a Research Fellow at the University of Sussex for 5 years. She obtained her PhD in Physics at Heriot-Watt University, UK; her research was in semiconductor detector physics.

ORCID 0000-0002-5321-143X

Senior Editor: João Leite, PhD; Springer Nature, UK

João has a background in biodiversity and population genetics from the University of Porto, Portugal. He joined Scientific Reports in 2021 after completing a PhD on the evolution of the dinosaur hand at the Natural History Museum and University College London. His interests include palaeontology, functional morphology, biomechanics, phylogenetics, ecology and biodiversity.

ORCID 0000-0001-9159-4016

Senior Editor: Thomas Tischer, PhD; Springer Nature, UK

Thomas studied Biochemistry and completed his PhD in Germany. During this time, he worked with Xenopus laevis frogs to understand the regulation of the cell cycle. He joined the MRC Laboratory of Molecular Biology in Cambridge, UK as a postdoc where he started to work with mouse oocytes. This experience made him fall in love with microscopy and he subsequently decided to work on centrosome biology in human cells, focusing on protein interactions and ubiquitylation. Thomas joined Scientific Reports in October 2022.

ORCID 0000-0002-6845-2762

Associate Editor: Shelby Bollen, PhD; Springer Nature, UK

Shelby joined Scientific Reports in June 2024 as a Locum Associate Editor after her PhD in Medicine and Health Sciences at the University of Nottingham. Her research was primarily focused on the genetics and mechanisms underlying the vitamin D axis in skeletal muscle and, as such, her interests lie in human physiology and metabolism, functional genetics, endocrinology, and ageing. She is based in the London office.

ORCID 0000-0002-3687-9948

Associate Editor: Will Bultitude, PhD; Springer Nature, UK

Will joined Scientific Reports in November 2022 after completing a post-doctoral position at UCL investigating the genetics of clathrin-mediated membrane trafficking. He also has a background in immunology and transplantation genetics following his PhD at Anthony Nolan Research Institute.

ORCID 0000-0003-2728-4237

Associate Editor: Jessica Mengqian Luo, PhD; Springer Nature, China

Jessica Mengqian Luo joined Scientific Reports in January 2024 after working for over a year with Collection Management & Acquisition Team as a Commissioning Editor. She completed her PhD in Cell and Molecular Biology from the Chinese University of Hong Kong and worked on protein trafficking and autophagy. She is based in Shanghai office.

ORCID 0000-0002-3212-234X

Associate Editor: Betty Mousikou, PhD; Springer Nature, Germany

Betty did a PhD in Cognitive Science at Macquarie University and then worked in academia for 10 years: she was a Marie-Curie Experienced Researcher at Bangor University, a British Academy Postdoctoral Fellow at Royal Holloway, University of London, and a Research Scientist at the Max Planck Institute for Human Development and the University of Göttingen. Before joining Scientific Reports in March 2023, Betty was an Associate Editor at the BMC Series.

ORCID 0000-0003-0611-9718

Associate Editor: Claire Potter, PhD; Springer Nature, UK

Claire joined Scientific Reports in April 2021 after working at a small academic publishing company for 18 months. She obtained her PhD from Imperial College London, UK and undertook postdoctoral work at King’s College London, UK. Her research was focused on vascular biology.

ORCID 0000-0002-6404-2301

Associate Editor: Martyna Stachaczyk, PhD; Springer Nature, UK

Martyna joined Scientific Reports in February 2023 after completing a postdoctoral fellowship at École Polytechnique Fédérale de Lausanne, where she developed novel, information theoretical metrics for assessing perceptual uncertainty in human and animal models of hallucinations. She completed her PhD in Bioengineering at Imperial College London in June 2022. Her interests include man-machine interfaces, cognitive neurotechnology, computational neuroscience, and bio-inspired engineering solutions.

ORCID 0000-0003-0164-7781

Associate Editor: Rachel Toth, PhD; Springer Nature, USA

Rachel joined Scientific Reports in December 2022 and is based in the Washington DC (USA) office. She completed a Ph.D. in Oncological Sciences at the University of Utah studying epigenetic misregulation in colorectal cancer, after which she studied the tumor microenvironment and drug resistance at the University of Arizona Cancer Center.

ORCID 0000-0001-8897-5045

Associate Editor: Inês Trindade, PhD; Springer Nature, Germany

Inês obtained her PhD from Universidade Nova in Lisbon (Portugal), after which she worked as a postdoc at the Freie Universität Berlin and the Potsdam University (Germany). She has a background in epigenetics, plant development and plant environmental interactions. She joined Scientific Reports in May 2022 and is based in the Berlin office.

ORCID 0000-0002-5221-767X

Associate Editor: Chenyu Wang, PhD; Springer Nature, USA

Chenyu Wang joined Scientific Reports in 2022 after working as a postdoctoral fellow in Los Alamos National Lab for 4 years. He completed a Ph.D. in Materials Chemistry at SUNY-Binghamton, USA, focusing on leveraging crystal growth knowledge to tailor the structure/properties of nanomaterials. Chenyu specializes in heterogeneous catalysis, material sciences, and energy-related applications. In particular, he finds fulfillment in interacting with researchers and providing quality author experience.

ORCID 0000-0001-8447-5086

Associate Editor: Junxia Wang, PhD; Springer Nature, China

Junxia joined Scientific Reports in 2024, and is based in Beijing, China. She completed her PhD at Xiamen University in July 2021, devoted in developing highly efficient molecular evolution platforms, followed by two years of postdoctoral work on pharmaceutical mRNA vaccines delivery at Zhejiang University. Her interest includes biotechnology, analytical chemistry, biomedical engineering, and pharmaceutical science.

ORCID 0000 0002 0596 7347

Manuscript Editor: Satej Bhutan, PhD; Springer Nature, India

Satej joined Scientific Reports in September 2023 after working as a Project Scientist at CSIR-CSMCRI. He has a PhD in Biosciences from Central University of Punjab, India, with expertise in phycology and molecular biology

ORCID 0000-0003-0790-5673

Manuscript Editor: Shital Bonde, PhD; Springer Nature, India

Shital joined Scientific Reports in August 2023 after working for two years with the ADIS Insight Drug Team as a senior scientific and medical writer at Springer Nature. She holds a PhD in Biotechnology from Amravati University and has previously contributed to a project with the Defense Research and Development Organization, India. Her expertise lies in nanobiotechnology, mycotoxins, and clinical research.

ORCID 0000-0002-4973-8976

Manuscript Editor: Madhumita Chakladar, PhD; Springer Nature, India

Madhumita has a background in cancer biology and completed her doctoral studies from Indian Institute of Science Education and Research (IISER), Pune, India. Her interest lies in clinical studies, bioinformatics, and cell biology. She joined the journal in 2023.

ORCID 0009-0006-2693-7995

Manuscript Editor: Mrigyanka Chakravarty, PhD; Springer Nature, India

Mrigyanka has a PhD in Ophthalmic Genetics from Tezpur University in Assam, India, working on Keratoconus. After this, she moved to the National Institute of Biomedical Genomics (West Bengal, India) for a short-term project on utilization of cutting-edge sequencing technologies in diagnosis of rare diseases. She joined Springer Nature as a Manuscript Editor for Scientific Reports in January 2023 and is based in Pune, India.

ORCID 0000-0002-5986-2102

Manuscript Editor: Shreyas Deshpande, PhD; Springer Nature, India

Shreyas has a Ph. D in Plant Science, with specialization in Plant insect interaction and Chemical ecology, from Department of Botany S.P. Pune University, Pune. He joined Scientific reports in March 2024 and is based at the Pune office.

ORCID 0000-0003-3434-8630

Manuscript Editor: Githa Ann George, PhD; Springer Nature, India

Githa joined Scientific Reports in May 2023, after working for five-years as a Scientific Analyst at Molecular Connections, India. In this role, she curated databases related to biomedicine, including biomarkers and clinical trial records. She holds a PhD in Marine Sciences from the Cochin University of Science and Technology, India, where her research focused on pioneering tools utilizing marine fish cell lines. These tools are pivotal for diagnosing viral infections and developing vaccines within the aquaculture sector.

ORCID 0000-0002-3145-2048

Manuscript Editor: Alkananda Karthick, PhD; Springer Nature, India

Alakananda is a diatomist. She joined Scientific Reports in 2023 with five years of experience in science communication and a PhD in wetland biomonitoring. Her interests include ecological assessment of water bodies, diatom culturing, and biodiversity.

ORCID 0009-0001-3487-2822

Manuscript Editor: Mahesh Khot, PhD; Springer Nature, India

Mahesh has a background in oleaginous fungi and fatty acid-based biofuels. He did a PhD in microbiology at the S. P. Pune University in India, followed by working with biotech start-ups and postdoctoral research at the Universidad de Concepción, Chile. He joined Scientific Reports in September 2023 and is based in the Pune office.

ORCID 0000-0002-8504-3098

Manuscript Editor: Sumedha Kondekar, PhD; Springer Nature, India

Sumedha joined Scientific Reports in December 2022 after completing a post-doctoral position at Commissariat à l'énergie atomique et aux énergies alternatives (CEA), Fontenay-aux-Roses, France. She completed her PhD from the Indian Institute of Science, Bangalore, India. Her area of research has been biochemistry, bacterial genetics, microbiology with a focus of understanding DNA-protein molecular machineries in a human pathogen Helicobacter pylori. Currently, she is based in Pune, India.

ORCID 0000-0003-1416-5466

Manuscript Editor: Supriya Lokhande, PhD; Springer Nature, India

Supriya joined Scientific Reports in December 2022 as a Manuscript Editor after 4 years within Springer Nature, working with Nature Research Journals and Transfer Desk team. She has a PhD in Physical Sciences from Shivaji University and worked as Dr. D. S. Kothari postdoctoral fellow at S.P. Pune University, India with a background in nanomaterials with applications in the energy sector. She is based in Pune, India.

ORCID 0000-0003-0696-1470

Manuscript Editor: Sneha Maheswari, PhD; Springer Nature, India

Sneha joined Scientific Reports in September 2023 following her brief post-doctoral study at Agharkar Research Institute in Pune, where she examined the characteristics of probiotics with potential applications in industry. She received her Doctorate in Microbiology from the same university and is an expert in the field of Renewable Energy.

ORCID 0009-0001-7042-7785

Manuscript Editor: Vijay Kumar Malesu, PhD; Springer Nature, India

Vijay joined Scientific Reports in August 2023 after working as a scientific writer at JoVE (Journal of Visualized Experiments). He holds a PhD in Biotechnology from KIIT University, India.

ORCID 0000-0003-4925-4661

Manuscript Editor: Sweta Naik, PhD; Springer Nature, India

Sweta has a background in Nanochemistry and completed her PhD in Chemistry from Virginia Commonwealth University, USA. Her interests lie in nanoparticle design and applications. Sweta joined Scientific Reports editorial team in 2023 and is based in the Pune office.

ORCID 0009-0008-1309-9050

Manuscript Editor: Rucha Paranjape, PhD; Springer Nature, India

Rucha joined Scientific Reports in September 2023. She has a PhD in plant molecular biology and metabolomics from S. P. Pune university. She is based in the Pune office.

ORCID 0000-0003-0774-4208

Manuscript Editor: Vincent Pinto, PhD; Springer Nature, India

Vincent has a background in plant biology and did his PhD at the University of Mysore, India. He joined Scientific Reports in December 2022 and is based in the Pune office.

ORCID 0000-0002-0503-9313

Manuscript Editor: Shibani Sukhi, PhD; Springer Nature, India

Shibani has a PhD in microbiology from Bhabha Atomic Research Center, Mumbai, India, and post doc experience as Science &Engineering Research Board (SERB, Gov. of India) young scientist and Department of Science and Technology, (DST, Gov. of India) woman scientist. She has worked on extremophiles and antimicrobial resistance. She joined Scientific Reports in August 2023 and is based in Pune, India.

ORCID 0009-0005-3324-4292

Manuscript Editor: Dhanashree Swami, PhD; Springer Nature, India

Dhanashree has a background in Plant Biotechnology and Biochemistry. She completed her PhD from Savitribai Phule Pune University, India, where she carried out phytochemical exploration from mangrove and non-mangrove plant. She joined Scientific Reports in August 2023 and is based in Pune, India.

ORCID 0000-0002-1032-8099

Manuscript Editor: Snigdha Tiwari, PhD; Springer Nature, India

Snigdha has a background in microbiology and yeast biotechnology. She completed her PhD at S.P Pune University, India, where she studied the biotechnological potential of insect-associated yeasts. She joined Scientific Reports in March 2023 and is based in Pune, India.

ORCID 0000-0002-7391-3850

Manuscript Editor: Sagar Yadav, PhD; Springer Nature, India

Sagar has a background in Plant Molecular Biology and Biotechnology. He completed his PhD at CSIR-National Chemical Laboratory, Pune, India, studying the molecular analysis of plant-fungus interactions. His interests lie in plant biotechnology, plant-pathogen interaction, and omics. He joined Scientific Reports in September 2023 and is based in Pune, India.

ORCID 0000-0001-7807-661X

Senior Editorial Board

Senior Editorial Board Members of Scientific Reports handle manuscripts in a broad range of topics within their general areas of expertise, in addition to advising on editorial board and journal development. The Senior Editorial Board is selected based on exceptional contributions to the journal.

Editorial Board Members

The Editorial Board manages the peer review process and makes final decisions on whether papers should be accepted. To learn more about some of our Editorial Board Members and discover what inspires them, please visit our Editorial Board highlights page.

The Editorial Board comprises experts from all major fields within the clinical, biological, chemical, physical and earth sciences, to ensure that each submission is handled by a specialist with an active research career.
